title: On-site Professional Maintenance, Subway Tile Backsplash*

posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1440 Sq.
From the moment you arrive, you’ll feel like you’ve come home.
Our Georgetown rental homes feature community amenities that are second to none.
Go for a swim in our resort-style swimming pool or workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center.
We have a dog park for your pup’s enjoyment.
Our team is dedicated to providing quick and excellent service when you need it.
Tour our community and see what makes Rivers Edge the best rental homes in Georgetown, Texas.

Smart Thermostats, Gas Range*, Wood Flooring, Slate Grey Quartz Countertops*, Front Yard and Fenced Back Yards, 2-inch Faux Wood Blinds, Irrigation Water Sensors*, Stand-up Showers, LED Lighting, Subway Tile Backsplash*, Trendy Grey Cabinetry*, Stand Alone Homes, 2 Car Attached Garage, Washer and Dryer Connections
